mlr3fda 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Flattens Functional Columns

    mlr_pipeops_flatfun.Rd

    Flattens Functional Columns

    Flattens Functional Columns

    Parameters

    The parameters are the parameters inherited from PipeOpTaskPreprocSimple, as well as the following parameters:

    • as_features :: logical()
      Whether to add the Flattened values to the features of the task.

    • selector :: function | Selector
      Selector function, takes a Task as argument and returns a character of features to keep. The flattening is only applied to those columns.
      See Selector for example functions. Default is selector_all(), which selects all of the functional` features.

    Super classes

    mlr3pipelines::PipeOp -> mlr3pipelines::PipeOpTaskPreproc -> mlr3pipelines::PipeOpTaskPreprocSimple -> PipeOpFlatFun

    Method new()

    Initializes a new instance of this Class.

    Usage

    PipeOpFlatFun$new(id = "flatfun", param_vals = list())

    Arguments

    id

    ()character(1))
    Identifier of resulting object, default "ffe".

    param_vals

    (named list)
    List of hyperparameter settings, overwriting the hyperparameter settings that would otherwise be set during construction. Default list().

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    PipeOpFlatFun$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
